front.title: IPv6 RA Options for Source Address Dependent Routing

abstract.t: This document proposes the router advertisement extensions for source address dependent routing. New Router Advertisement options are defined for configuring route prefixes and their corresponding source prefixes on the mobile or fixed nodes. Using these options, an operator can easily configure nodes with multiple interfaces (or otherwise multi-homed) to enable them to select the routes to a destination. Each option is defined together with definitions of host and router behaviors.
